      • setUrl

        @NotNull
public @NotNull HttpRequester setUrl(@NotNull
                                               @NotNull java.lang.String url,
                                               @NotNull
                                               @NotNull java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> params)
                                        throws java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        Sets the URL to request.
        Parameters:
        url - The URL without query
        params - A map that contains URL query parameters into key and value. The key and value will be percent encoded as UTF-8.
        Throws:
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException - Occurs when UTF-8 is not available.
        Since:
        v1.1.0

      • setMethod

        @NotNull
public @NotNull HttpRequester setMethod(@NotNull
                                                  @NotNull java.lang.String method)
        Sets HTTP method.
        Parameters:
        method - HTTP method as String type (ex. "POST", "GET" etc)
        It's not case sensitive, so you can use both "POST" and "post".
        Since:
        v1.0.0

public @NotNull HttpResponse request()

                                               java.io.IOException
        Send HTTP request to a web server.

      • request

        @NotNull
public @NotNull HttpResponse request(boolean autoRedirection)
                                        throws java.net.SocketTimeoutException,
                                               java.io.IOException
        Send HTTP request to a web server.
        Parameters:
        autoRedirection - If it set to true, detect and re-request new URL automatically.
        Returns:
        An HTML response from the web server.
        Throws:
        java.net.SocketTimeoutException - Occurs when timeout.
        java.io.IOException
        Since:
        v1.1.1
